name: Pre School Letter Tracer writing practice - Alphabet flashcard tracing phonics and drawing
name_original: Pre School Letter Tracer writing practice - Alphabet flashcard tracing phonics and drawing
description:
Teach your kids to trace letters, numbers and shapes, even cursive. If the tracing is good, letter sound will be played in English .

Teach your child to write the whole alphabet with fun. Handwriting has never been so easy!
